advantage_conditions: We keep all conditions and all prices in plain sight. No hidden fees, charges, or taxes. You immediately see the final price, which will not change while you place your order.
advantage_deposit: In international rentals, deposits reach several thousand euros, which are blocked on the client’s card. We have an average deposit of 300 euros, and there are cars without a deposit.
advantage_damage_cheaper: We assess the damage in the presence of the client. Our prices are 2-3 times lower than international rentals. And we never debit money from the client’s card after returning the car.
international_law: Is it necessary to obtain international licenses?
prepayment: To rent a car on your website, do I need 100% prepayment?
